alerts.description: Alert Accounting of Support Closed Case
Alert Alicia when At Risk case is created
Alert Cancellation Team of Support Case Completion
Data and Reporting New Case Alert
Salesforce Help Desk- New Case Alert
Send an email notification to the case owner when the case is not being followed up

fieldUpdates.formula: TEXT(FLOOR(TermSUBacq__c/365)) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD(TermSUBacq__c,365)/30)) &' Months' & ' ' & TEXT(MOD(MOD(TermSUBacq__c,365),30)) &' Days'
fieldUpdates.name: Update Customer Term
Update Date Changed From Working Request
Update Date Changed to Working Request

rules.description: Alert Alicia when At Risk case is created
Support Case Auto Response for Feedback emails

rules.formula: AND ( ISCHANGED (Status), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE (Status), '5 - Moved to Launch'))

rules.description: Trigger an AskNicely survey when a case is closed.

tasks.subject: Case is still in Working Request Status

tasks.description: Please send the customer a post process follow up.
tasks.subject: Rapid Response Case 7-day Follow up
